name: standards
description: The coding standards used at log.

scripts.build: npm run install && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.publish: npm run build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add --all && git commit -m 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:log-oscon/Standards gh-pages --force

author: Engenharia
